import React from "react"; import styles from "./Navbar.module.css"; export default function Navbar({ menuOpen, toggleMenu, closeMenu }) { const handleMenuLinkClick = () => closeMenu(); const handleOverlayClick = () => closeMenu(); return (
  • Home
  • About me
  • Skills
  • Experiences
{/* Mobile Menu */}
  • Home
  • About me
  • Skills
  • Experiences
); }
